markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Sacrifice](/Feats.aspx?ID=1911) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51)

**Prerequisites**
[Blessed One Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1910)

</column>

---

You gain the [_protector's sacrifice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=441) domain spell as a devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Blessed Sacrifice
